meanings.definition: A small quantity or amount of something scattered or sprinkled.
meanings.sent1: She added a few sprinklings of sugar to her coffee.
meanings.sent2: The chef added some sprinklings of herbs to the dish for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The cat left tiny sprinklings of fur all over the couch.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky looked like sprinklings of diamonds on black velvet.
meanings.sent5: The garden was covered in colorful sprinklings of flower petals.

meanings.definition: The act of scattering or sprinkling something.
meanings.sent1: The sprinklings of seeds in the garden were done carefully.
meanings.sent2: After the party, the cleanup crew took care of the sprinklings of confetti on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The sprinklings of paint on the canvas created a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush created delicate sprinklings of color on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The sprinklings of salt on the pretzel made it extra tasty.
